summary: ICP dapp scaffold for Bargen (bargain-shopping mediator between customers and shopkeepers): Motoko backend with authorization/access control + React/Vite/Tailwind (shadcn/ui) frontend with Internet Identity auth and core pages (shop discovery, product details, cart, messages, shopkeeper profile/products, bargain/best-deal UI). Planned enhancements include seeded demo shops/products (INR pricing + product photos), multi-shop bargaining, smart/AI deal assistance, price transparency badges, offline-first chat/sync, and optional micro-delivery + reserve/pick-up flows, plus supporting docs (architecture diagram, wireframes, pitch, roadmap).

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold with authorization/access control
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with authorization mixins and access-control module; wired into main canister entrypoint.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration (frontend)
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks and components for Internet Identity login/logout and gating app routes/content (e.g., AuthGate, LoginButton, useInternetIdentity, useActor).

existing_features.title: React/Vite + Tailwind frontend scaffold with app layout and navigation
existing_features.description: App shell components (header/footer/layout) and Vite/TS/Tailwind setup with shared utilities/config.

existing_features.title: Core user pages: shop discovery, product detail, cart, and messages thread
existing_features.description: Implemented primary app routes/pages for browsing shops, viewing a product, managing cart view, and viewing a messages thread.

existing_features.title: Shopkeeper management pages: profile form and products
existing_features.description: Pages for shopkeeper profile editing and listing/managing shopkeeper products.

existing_features.title: Bargain request UI components
existing_features.description: UI components for requesting bargains/best-deal interactions (e.g., BargainRequestForm, BestDealRequestButton).

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: Added a broad set of shadcn/ui components to the frontend project template for rapid UI building.

existing_features.title: Build template and deployment tooling for ICP app
existing_features.description: Provided build-template with Dockerfile, deploy scripts, ICP canister yaml configs, workspace/package management, and helper scripts (e.g., image prune/resize).

existing_features.title: Generated brand assets (hero and logo)
existing_features.description: Generated and included branded hero/banner and logo images under frontend public assets.

existing_features.title: Verify and fix (if needed) the existing core user flows already present in the project: Internet Identity login/logout, shop discovery/product listing, product detail view, add-to-cart + cart page, submit bargain request (including best-deal request), and product messages thread send/receive.

Add/ensure a clear, user-facing in-app error message (in English) for cases where backend calls fail (e.g., not authenticated, missing data, or unexpected errors) so the app does not silently fail during the core flows.

new_feature_requests.summary: Seed demo shopkeepers with random shop names/details (shop name, ratings, address, distance in km, contact, Google Maps link) and fixed prices that can be bargained
Seed demo products across provided second-hand categories and ensure prices display in Indian Rupees (₹)
Generate and attach product photos/images for seeded products
Smart Bargain Suggestion feature (auto-suggest fair price/counter based on data)
Price Transparency Badge feature (indicate trustworthy/consistent pricing)
Multi-Shop Bargain Mode (send one bargain to multiple shops)
Micro-delivery partners integration (optional) with delivery quote after deal acceptance (e.g., Dunzo/Rapido/Porter)
Reserve & Pick-Up option after deal accepted
Offline mode for chat/actions: store locally when network drops and sync when online
AI Deal Assistant (future): suggest counter prices, acceptance probability, and peak hours for best deals
Create UI wireframes for both customer and shopkeeper experiences
Make sure the existing bargaining website scaffold runs successfully end-to-end as a working model: the project must build without errors and the deployed app must load in the browser.

architectural_notes: Backend: Motoko canister with modular authorization/access-control (mixin-based).
Frontend: React + Vite + TypeScript with TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui component set.
Auth: Internet Identity is the primary authentication provider; frontend uses hooks/components to create authenticated actors.
Deployment: Includes build-template with canister YAMLs and deploy script for ICP workflows.
Assets: Image pipeline scripts included (resize/prune) with generated brand images stored in public/assets/generated.
Backend: Added/updated canister migration support (migration.mo) alongside main canister entrypoint changes.
Build template: Standardized pnpm workspace + ICP canister YAML structure; includes custom ESLint rules for ICP/II best practices.
Demo/seed data requested: random shopkeepers + second-hand product catalog for testing.
UI/UX requirement: display product prices in Indian Rupees (₹).
Assets requirement: generate product photos for seeded catalog items.
